original_text: Now the men were watching for a sign, and they quickly took it up from him and said, “Yes, your brother Ben-hadad.” Then he said, “Go and bring him.” Then Ben-hadad came out to him, and he caused him to come up into the chariot.
korean_text: 그 사람들이 좋은 징조로 여기고 그 말을 얼른 받아 대답하여 이르되 벤하닷은 왕의 형제니이다 왕이 이르되 너희는 가서 그를 인도하여 오라 벤하닷이 이에 왕에게 나아오니 왕이 그를 병거에 올린지라

sentences.original_text: Now the men were watching for a sign
and they quickly took it up from him
Then Ben-hadad came out to him,
and he caused him to come up into the chariot.
